name: Girl That Eats Time
description:
Please note that the the browser version might not work too well for everybody, if you experience any issues please download the executable. Thanks

You play as 'the girl that eats time'

Your very existence passively consumes time of the world you're in. As such, in this world, the time flow accelerates and the world is slowly getting destroyed behind you. 

You can collect free time of the world to consume it later and slow down the flow of time. But remember, the collected free time is also your life force (a.k.a. your health, so be mindful of it)

Controls are simple and can be changed in the game settings

  • Movement: A/D or Arrow Keys (Left/Right) 
  • Jump: Space
  • Special (consume time): E
  • Interact / next text (in tutorial): F / Enter

Now run! run with all your strength until you can no longer move your legs, and when your strength betrays you, feast upon the delicious time!

This is my first published project, thank you for taking your time to play and check it out! 
Please leave a comment with your thoughts and feedback! I am open to critical feedback.
